changeSet.author: David Tilser
changeSet.createView: select distinct x.id, x.public_key, x.my_public_key, x.level from ( select uc.id, u2.public_key, u.public_key as my_public_key, 'FIRST' as level from users u2 join user_contact uc on (uc.hash_to = u2.hash or uc.hash_to = 'next:' + u2.hash) join users u on u.hash = uc.hash_from union select uc3.id, u4.public_key, u.public_key as my_public_key, 'SECOND' as level from users u join user_contact uc2 on u.hash = uc2.hash_from join user_contact uc3 on uc2.hash_to = uc3.hash_to join users u4 on uc3.hash_from = u4.hash ) x where x.public_key is not null and x.public_key != x.my_public_key
